name: Vintage Metal Light Fixture - Underwriters Laboratories
description:
Such a lovely vintage find!

White painted metal surrounding a glass globe that has kind of a wavy pattern around it (please see photos, hard to explain!).

Needs new wiring hardware if you intend to wire it. The current socket unscrews and comes out quite easily and measurements are noted below ♥

MEASUREMENTS:
small hole where socket is: approx. 1 3/8" diameter
base opening diameter: 5 1/4"
globe base opening diameter: approx. 3 1/8"
approx. 9" top to bottom & 10 1/4" total width of piece

name: Extra TALL Salt and Pepper Shakers
description:
Such a sweet and lovely set of tall ceramic Salt and Pepper Shakers.

Unique coloring and style - LOVE all the little details and the large lettering of the "S" and "P".

Lovely to use or just to display ♥

CONDITION: Good, no chips, cracks, or crazing. Stoppers are rolling around inside the jars and will need to be replaced or a small piece of tape placed across the bottom in order to be used.

MEASUREMENTS:
approx. 6" high x 2 1/2" wide

name: Liz Claiborne Villager Purse in Delightful Rose Pink
description:
LOVE a functional purse with organized storage ... and the rose pink color of this polyvinyl bag is marvelous!

* One interior zip pocket in the middle section
* Three separate compartments for organization!

Condition is FAIR: 
* One white spot/stain area about the size of a dime.
*Significant wear to the strap where the brown and/or pink vinyl has worn away.

Still a very charming little bag - perfect for evenings out and about when you don't want to lug your big purse around!

*Feel free to contact us with any questions!

Measurements:
approx. 9 1/2" long at bottom & 8" long at top
approx. 8 1/2" from strap to purse opening
